attributes.additional_details:
The majority of 'job agencies' very rarely reply to the many applications/cv's forwarded by prospective employees.  This practice is demeaning and soul destroying and should be outlawed.  An email reply to applications submitted on line is necessary feedback and a matter of courtesy.  If agencies don't have the staff to reply, let them employ someone desperately seeking work!
Feedback/Replies for all job applications, by law!
